meanings.sent1: The advancing car reached the finish line first.

meanings.sent3: The advancing turtle surprised everyone by winning the race.
meanings.sent4: Her advancing determination pushed her to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent5: The advancing storm clouds signaled an approaching thunderstorm.

meanings.definition: Promoting or furthering a cause or idea
meanings.sent1: Her advancing efforts in fundraising helped the charity greatly.
meanings.sent2: The advancing campaign raised awareness about environmental issues.
meanings.sent3: The advancing joke at the meeting lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: His advancing speech inspired many to join the cause.
